summary: Spell pack created for my persona
descriptionHtml:
Log:
Adeed:
Magnetic Blade:
Make current target a meat shield for 3 seconds per strike, draining 10 health per second for 3 seconds per strike.

Spells:

Gravity Shift - If I move smarter then I may get some protection if I made any right decisions in life.
(Increases my movement speed by 60%, Uses mage armor perks)
(Lesser Power)
Casting Perk: Alteration Novice 00

Electromagnetic Crush - Whats outside of the box... stays outside of the box.
(Slows time by 20%, Summons a thunder storm, Increases movement speed by 20%.)
(Power)

Astral Channel - Some..Times!
(Slows time by 65%, Increases movement speed by 30% for 45s.)
(Right Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Apprentice 25
Charge Time: 1.5 Seconds
Spell Cost: 100

Astral Dome - Element of an unfamiliar.
(Improves my armor rating by 100 points for 45s, recovers my magicka by 1 point per second for 1 day.)
(Right Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Expert 75
Charge Time: 1.5 Seconds
Spell Cost: 138

Zero Dome - May my body be my grave.
(Improves my armor rating by 360 points. Cast shock cloak around me. fortify magicka by 200 points,Uses mage armor perks)
(Right Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Expert 75
Charge Time: 30 Seconds
Spell Cost: 666

Sickness Within - Before the origins of concept.
Before the origins of the concept of conceptual establishments.
(Damages my health by 30 points, Fortify alteration spells by 100%, fortify magicka by 300 points, causes an inferno where casted.)
(Power)
Casting Perk: Alteration Master 100
Charge Time: 3 Seconds
Spell Cost: 300

Tier Z - My soul speaks through a manifestation of the concepts of fire in its entirety.
(Causes an Inferno where casted, summons a Fire atronauch.)
(power)
Casting Perk: Alteration Expert 75
Charge Time: 3 Seconds
Spell Cost: 300

Gaia's Gasp - The lands true nature.
(Telekenesis can grap actors and absorb health)
(Either Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Novice 00
Charge Time: 3 Seconds
Spell Cost: 0

Aurora Fabric - Static Impulses.
(ast shock cloak around target.)
(Both Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Novice 00
Charge Time: 2 Seconds
Spell Cost: 150

Death Avarice - Move that weapon if you want..
(Reanimates target for 1 day)
(Both Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Apprentice 25
Charge Time: 2 Seconds
Spell Cost: 150

Organic Simulation - My powers are awakening!
(Absorbs Alteration from target)
(Both Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Apprentice 25
Charge Time: 2 Seconds
Spell Cost: 150

Electrical Unit - Short circuited..
(Fire breathe that damages health and paralyzes targets, crackling light hits target then jumps to new enemies.)
(Both Hand Spell)
Casting Perk: Alteration Expert 75
Charge Time: 10 Seconds
Spell Cost: 300
author: Yyzi
